UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that may represent a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: High Affinity Peptide Inhibitors of the Hepatitis C Virus NS3-4A Protease Refractory to Common Resistant Mutants
Literature.Author: Kügler J, Schmelz S, Gentzsch J, Haid S, Pollmann E, van den Heuvel J, Franke R, Pietschmann T, Heinz DW, Collins J

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Hepatitis C virus (HCV)(IC50 REP=36.4µM),Hepatitis C virus (HCV) m1(IC50 REP=49.3µM),Hepatitis C virus (HCV) m2(IC50 REP=72.5µM)
